adv.js: { sessionStorage.setItem("previousPage", window.location.href); sessionStorage.setItem("root", "/ppds/home"); auditTrail({ type: "visit", activity: `Membuka Halaman Kelola Shortcut`, meta: { url: window.location.href, }, }); const res = await db.m_user_action.findMany({ where: { id_client: Number(user.id_client), id_user: Number(user.id), }, select: { id: true, id_action_hidden: true, }, }); if (res) { local.id_hide = []; res.forEach((e) => { local.id_hide.push(e.id_action_hidden); }); } local.render(); }} > {children}
{ let hide = local.id_hide?.find((o) => o === item.id); local.id_hide = local.id_hide.filter((e) => e !== item.id); if (!hide) { local.id_hide.push(item.id); } local.render(); }} > {children}

sample.name: prop

adv.js:
<button
  {...props}
  style={{
    backgroundColor:
      type_button === "Success"
        ? "green"
        : type_button === "Edit"
        ? "#FFFFFF"
        : type_button === "Danger"
        ? "#ffffff"
        : type_button === "Checkout"
        ? "#159895"
        : type_button === "Disabled"
        ? "gray"
        : "#0062A3",
    border:
      type_button === "Edit"
        ? "2px solid #002B5B"
        : type_button === "Danger"
        ? "2px solid #870707"
        : "0px",
    borderRadius: type_button === "Checkout" ? "20px" : "10px",
    width: type_button === "Checkout" ? "100px" : width_button,
  }}
  type={type_button === "Submit" ? "submit" : "button"}
  onPointerUp={(e) => {
    if (type_button !== "Disabled" && type_button !== "Submit") {
      if (action === "navigate") {
        navigate(navigate_link);
      } else {
        action_function(e);
      }
    }
  }}
>
  {children}
</button>
